name: Morkva Nova Post
author: MORKVA

sections.faq:
Can I use the plugin without API key?

No, the autocomplete will not work without valid and up-to-date API key.

Will it work with checkout blocks?

No, the plugin currently works only with default [woocommerce_checkout] shortcode.
sections.changelog:
0.2.1

  • [dev] assets updates

0.2.0

  • [new] added multi-language support
  • [new] changed settings UI
  • [fix] fixed shipping zones
  • [fix] changed menu prefix

0.1.1

  • [fix] fixed country switcher

0.1.0

  • [new] added delivery method Nova Post
sections.description:
Nova Post – European logistics company operating in Germany, Austria, Moldova, Latvia, Estonia, Lithuania, Poland, Romania, Slovakia, Czech Republic, Italy, Hungary, France (Finland and Netherlands soon).

üëâÔ∏è Description

This plugin will let you integrate with Nova Post and ship to your customers in the EU countries (where Nova Post operates) or extort to Ukraine.

This is new plugin, so we are open for feature requests. Pro-version will be available soon too.

üëâÔ∏è Functions

  • Delivery method to branch/postamat
  • Removes unnesessary billing address fields, so your customers make less clicks and you get better conversions
  • Fixed or free shipping cost
  • Free shipping text if the order amount qualifies

üëâÔ∏è Getting started

  1. Register an account at Nova Post
  2. Get your API key
  3. Copy API key to plugin settings, and Save.
  4. Add Nova Post shipping method to valid countries or regions. The plugin will display shipping method only in valid countries.

üëâÔ∏è 3rd party service

Our plugin relies on Nova Post API
» Nova Post API
Nova Post Privacy policy:
